Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad plan to collect clues from OCR, built environment, and natural features without a specific hypothesis.
Gathering OCR-derived clues to narrow search to a German-speaking region, still in broad clue-collection mode.
Divergent exploration of signage and architecture to collect more clues (Spanish tapas bar, Electorate of Cologne coat of arms).
Continued broad clue collection via business names without yet testing a specific location hypothesis.

Depth-First.Explanation: A specific hypothesis (Bonn, Germany) is proposed and now being verified against observed details.
KeyElement: Hypothesis: Bonn, Germany based on coat of arms

Depth-First.Explanation: Using Google Maps and Street View to confirm that the buildings and environment match the hypothesis.
KeyElement: Matching building façades and street environment

Depth-First.Explanation: Confirming the exact restaurant location at Mehlgasse 11, Bonn and matching details via Street View.
Synthesizing all collected and verified clues to finalize and confirm the location.
KeyElement: Integrated OCR, man-made and environmental clues

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Moved from broad clue collection to verifying a specific hypothesis (Bonn, Germany).
